# editor-icon

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                        | Type                                                                                                                                                        | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `name` _(required)_ | `name`    | The name of the semantic editor icon.              | `"commandPalette" \| "commentThread" \| "cursorInsert" \| "docOutline" \| "formatBold" \| "formatHeading" \| "insertBlock" \| "pageBreak" \| "tableAddRow"` | `undefined` |
| `size`              | `size`    | The size of the icon in pixels (width and height). | `number`                                                                                                                                                    | `20`        |
